DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety antiviral activity ABT-450/ritonavir/ABT-267 ( ABT-450/r/ABT-267 ; ABT-450 also know paritaprevir ; ABT-267 also know ombitasvir ) ABT-333 ( also know dasabuvir ) without ribavirin ( RBV ) patient chronic hepatitis C virus genotype 1b ( HCV GT1b ) infection without cirrhosis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Effect Experimental Drugs ABT-450/Ritonavir/ABT-267 ( ABT-450/r/ABT-267 ) ABT-333 Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , multicenter study evaluate safety antiviral activity combination ABT-450/ritonavir/ABT-267 ( ABT-450/r/ABT-267 ) ABT-333 without ribavirin ( RBV ) treatment-experienced , noncirrhotic participant chronic hepatitis C virus genotype 1b ( HCV GT1b ) infection .
DOC.criteria: Females must practice specific form birth control study treatment , postmenopausal 2 year surgically sterile Chronic hepatitis C , genotype 1binfection ( HCV RNA level great equal 10,000 IU/mL screen ) Subject 's hepatitis C virus genotype subgenotype 1b Screening without co infection genotype/subgenotype . Significant liver disease cause HCV primary cause Positive hepatitis B surface antigen antihuman immunodeficiency virus antibody Positive screen drug alcohol Use contraindicate medication within 2 week dose
